sourcesContent:
Home Me
import { Component, OnChanges, OnInit, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import { GuardService } from 'src/app/services/guard.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit, OnChanges{ isLogged = false; constructor(private guardService: GuardService){} ngOnChanges(changes: SimpleChanges): void { this.ngOnInit } ngOnInit(): void { this.isLogged = this.guardService.authorized(); } }
